name: tm40
effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Defense Curl Gen I: Skull Bash)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: An extremely fast attack that can’t be avoided.
flavor_text.emerald: An extremely fast attack that can’t be avoided.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An extremely fast attack against one target. It can’t be evaded.
